medium: Color etching, linocut and woodcut on Japan paper
title: The Singing Bridge
marks: Signature, date, inscription Lower center: [ctp/1979/Steven Sorman]
description: Large square grid with juxtaposing red rectangle in LL and LRQs, and square table in its center; gold horizontal and vertical stripes along upper margin; blue horizontal and vertical stripes along bottom margin
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
